Posts.Content: Hi! I'm 20 and I've never really had any health problems at all. I'm used to my breasts getting a little sore whenever it's that time of the month, but that was 2 weeks ago and it is [I]never[I] like this. I'm experiencing almost constant achey pain in my left breast and my left nipple is intense pain. If I touch it, I get nauseous almost instantly, but I can feel a small, oval-shaped, lump on the underside of my nipple. I don't know what to do... Advice??
Posts.Title: Lump behind nipple and intense pain! Scared...
